maintenance_key3: Campus me maintenance aur repairs ka dhyaan rakhna
maintenance_key4: Campus me dormitories and classrooms ke liye accommodation related samaan ko arrange
maintenance_key5: New students ko rooms allot karna aur har 45 days par rooms ko reshuffle karna
maintenance_key6: Utilities ka bill payment aur unka sahi istemaal ensure karna
maintenance_key7: Premises ka hygiene aur cleaning schedule banana
maintenance_key8: Waste management, water recyling aur aise aur inititiatives ke zariye campus ko self-sustainable banane par kaam karna
